title: Sweet and sour turkey meatballs
ingredients: ['Meatballs', '450g minced turkey', '75g fresh white breadcrumbs', '1 egg, lightly beaten', '1/4 tsp ground ginger', '1/4 tsp ground cumin', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper', '2 tbsp plain flour for dusting', 'sunflower oil for frying', 'Fruit sauce', '75g dried cranberries', '430g can pineapple pieces in natural juice', '2 tbsp caster sugar', '1 1/2 tsp cornflour', '3 tbsp cranberry sauce or jelly']
